Tree Shepherd.name: Tree Shepherd
Tree Shepherd.text: Choose 1 of your pieces: If it is common, upgrade it; if heroic, it may do 1 combat move; if legendary, it may do 1 standard move.

Kiskin Boughrunner.name: Kiskin Boughrunner
Kiskin Boughrunner.text: The Kiskin Boughrunner may do up to 3 combat moves. Each move must end on a square adjacent to one of your pieces.

Naiad.name: Naiad
Naiad.text: You may choose up to 2 of your pieces adjacent to the Naiad and do 1 standard move with each.

Charging Buck.name: Charging Buck
Charging Buck.text: The Charging Buck may do up to 2 combat leaps, each of distance exactly 2.

Woodland Druid.name: Woodland Druid
Woodland Druid.text: Upgrade 1 common piece of each color.

Forest Ancient.name: Forest Ancient
Forest Ancient.text: Place 2 enemy common pieces on empty squares up to distance 2. Then destroy 2 common pieces of the same color or colors up to distance 3.

Kiskin Spirit.name: Kiskin Spirit
Kiskin Spirit.text: You may choose a card from your discard pile and put it on top of your deck. If you do, or if your discard pile was empty, draw 1 extra card from your deck at the end of this turn.

Sapling.name: Sapling
Sapling.text: Upgrade the Sapling after summoning it.

Centaur Chieftain.name: Centaur Chieftain
Centaur Chieftain.text: The Centaur Chieftain may do 1 combat move. If he does, you may do up to 3 combat moves in the same direction, using other pieces of yours.

Sylvan Queen.name: Sylvan Queen
Sylvan Queen.text: You may convert 1 non-legendary enemy piece on a diagonally adjacent square to your piece of the same rank.

Forest Mystic.name: Forest Mystic
Forest Mystic.text: At the end of this turn, draw 1 extra card from your deck and 1 extra card from the legendary deck.

Unicorn.name: Unicorn
Unicorn.text: Choose one: Either the Unicorn may do 1 combat move, or you gain 1 action.

Centaur Spearman.name: Centaur Spearman
Centaur Spearman.text: The Centaur Spearman may do 1 combat move. If he does, destroy the next piece in the same direction, unless it is legendary.

Forest Wardens.name: Forest Wardens
Forest Wardens.text: Destroy 1 common piece of an opponent with more common pieces than you. Destroy 1 heroic piece of an opponent with more upgraded pieces than you.

Sylvan Princess.name: Sylvan Princess
Sylvan Princess.text: You may convert 1 common enemy piece on a diagonally adjacent square to your common piece.

Kiskin Leafsplitter.name: Kiskin Leafsplitter
Kiskin Leafsplitter.text: Up to 2 times, you may choose a diagonal direction and destroy the first piece in that direction.

Dryad.name: Dryad
Dryad.text: On one of the adjacent squares, you may convert 1 non-legendary enemy piece to your common piece.

Kiskin Farseeders.name: Kiskin Farseeders
Kiskin Farseeders.text: You may place 1 common piece of your color on an empty square adjacent to one of your pieces.
